Articles.Content:
Hi everyone , saturday is a day for fun , so there's a special mission for you today !

Warning !

You need BD-Armory 0.8.2 :[https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/90/BahamutoD%27s%20Armory](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/90/BahamutoD%27s%20Armory)

( Work with BD-Armory 0.8.1 too )

Module Manager 2.6.3 : [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55219-1-00-Module-Manager-2-6-3-%28May-4%29-Bonsai-Trimming-Kit-Edition](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55219-1-00-Module-Manager-2-6-3-%28May-4%29-Bonsai-Trimming-Kit-Edition)

( Work with Module Manager 2.6.2 too )

A KSP V1.02 Ofc !

Add Mission 1 : BD-A-M1-Base defence Dificulty :\*\*\*

Add Mission 2 : BD-A-M2-Island recover Dificulty :\*\*

Add Mission 3 : BD-A-M3-Death Cube Dificulty :\*\*\*\*

So , this work as a normal save when i placed some Turrel . Yep but non-friendly turrel . They all have the Team B flag . There's Canon turrel with a short scan delay & aggressive turel with a long scan delay .

Why a normal save ? Because i wanna let you see all turrel spot & design your craft ! Feel free to takeoff a strong plane carrier or fight with your favorite tank killer ! Go by a rocket ? Why not ...

![BD-M3-%20%281%29.jpg?psid=1](https://wjdbyg-sn3302.files.1drv.com/y2p5BRNPcgKQxtq_ok-zEKhAa0pvlKOELh2Fnf8-pzA_-AIfFbcqAl18g43tYFzckU7w0c4O8j8mruv7d5d7QL2aTIe-e-0pkbeOrWJ679oBvJOO5yN1BOx7JnhsACXuTaDJ54-GlixKrH7qmz0keL6UpJwerWZ81OWc83QYZZe7Ao/BD-M3-%20%281%29.jpg?psid=1)

You just have to unrar to your save folder , it's a sandbox save .

Hold F9 to reset the mission & back to KSC .

BD-A-M1-Base Defence : [https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=b4fec25180514b47!1286&authkey=!AKNMocYK-mK1jpc&ithint=file%2crar](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=b4fec25180514b47!1286&authkey=!AKNMocYK-mK1jpc&ithint=file%2Crar)

Comming soon :

-More mission

-work on lower parts count ( Mission 1 can slow down a bit , drop to 45 FPS ) 

-Make a various Kerbin spot Defence/Attack

See ya , Mission 4 incoming !

( Not sure if it's the best thread for post save files , tell me )

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-09T22:33:45Z" title="05/09/2015 10:33  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 9, 2015</time> by ZLM-Master**
  
Add Mission & Jet fighter

I really like the scenario, maybe theyÃ‚Â´re a bit overpowered. (HavenÃ‚Â´t tried it, but your pic looks frightening.) I also really liked the [return to sender](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98262-Operation-Return-to-Sender-%28Sequel-is-being-made%29) challenge some time ago. Maybe you can take some inspiration from it?

I think the right subforum would be challenges. Maybe you want to ask a mod, they should know better.

Yep Kerdinand , i take a look at "return to sender" . It's a interesting challenge ! I try to raise down the enemy force & having a better looking turret .

I also add 2 new mission with my personal Fighter , i work on better mission like rescue or capture the flag .

Have a nice day ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
